E-1.decision_scope: Individual task execution under direct supervision

E-2.decision_scope: Individual task execution with minimal guidance

E-3.decision_scope: Task execution with occasional peer mentoring

E-4.decision_scope: Small team task coordination and on-the-job training

E-5.decision_scope: Team operations, training, and daily task management

E-6.decision_scope: Multi-team coordination, training programs, and performance management

E-7.decision_scope: Department-level operations, policy implementation, and staff development

E-8.decision_scope: Multi-department operations, organizational policy, and strategic planning

E-9.decision_scope: Organization-wide operations, executive advisory, and strategic leadership

W-1.decision_scope: Technical systems management and specialist advisory

W-2.decision_scope: Advanced technical operations and team technical leadership

W-3.decision_scope: Technical program management and cross-functional advisory

W-4.decision_scope: Enterprise technical strategy and senior advisory

W-5.decision_scope: Organization-wide technical authority and executive advisory

O-2.decision_scope: Multi-team operations, project planning, and resource allocation

O-3.decision_scope: Company-level operations, budget management, and strategic execution

O-4.decision_scope: Battalion-level operations, organizational strategy, and cross-functional leadership

O-5.decision_scope: Large organization management, strategic planning, and executive decision-making

O-6.decision_scope: Brigade/regiment-level command, enterprise strategy, and policy development

O-7.decision_scope: Division-level strategic leadership and enterprise transformation
O-7.civilian_equivalent: Senior Vice President / Chief Operating Officer

O-8.decision_scope: Corps-level command, multi-division operations, and national strategy
O-8.civilian_equivalent: Executive Vice President / Chief Operating Officer

O-9.decision_scope: Theater-level command, joint operations, and strategic policy

O-10.decision_scope: Global operations command, national defense strategy, and executive leadership
